main_account.title: Your current account
main_account.description_1: Be the real owner of your funds, only you can interact with your sovereign current account.

investment_account.description_1: This investment behaves like a savings account, only better!
investment_account.description_2: Lock in your funds and earn interest from the first minute. Withdraw anytime.

transaction.title: This operation requires your attention
